title: Number of cats in the U.S. 2000 to 2017
summary: Overall Number of cats in millions has decreased over the Year.
Number of cats in millions is slightly decreasing from 2013 to 2015.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2013 and 2015.
The highest Number of cats in millions, of value 95.6 was reached at Year 2013
Minimum Number of cats in millions about 85.8 was reached at Year 2015
